text: The Fyrd are not a standing army, and they expect to spend the Winters at home. Maintaining Fyrd units during this time will be increasing expensive.

The Fyrd are not a standing army, and they expect to be disbanded in peace times. As a result, maintaining Fyrd units during peace time will incur extra costs.
The Fyrd fight in larger battles on behalf of the King, but their more important function is in smaller levied forces that ward off raiders and keep the King's peace throughout England.

We are at war! During the best months of the year Fyrdmen as expected to serve their Thegns in military campaigns. \\n\\n However, the Fyrd are not at their full number. Obtaining the loyalty of the governors in your Kingdom will allow you to access Fyrd units with further reduced cost.

We are at war! During the best months of the year Fyrdmen as expected to serve their Thegns in military campaigns. \\n\\n However, the Fyrd are not at their full number. Obtaining the loyalty of the governors in your Kingdom will allow you to access Fyrd units with further reduced cost. \\n\\n Since our Kingdom focuses heavily on the Fyrd, we benefit from improved experience for Fyrd recruits.

War has reached our borders! During the best months of the year Fyrdmen as expected to serve their Thegns in military campaigns. \\n\\n  We have the people's support, and the Fyrd can be levied at a reduced cost

The Fyrd are not a standing army, and they must return to their farms each Autumn to reap the year’s Harvest. As a result, maintaining Fyrd units during Harvest time will incur a large food upkeep per Fyrd unit maintained.

The people are contented with your stewardship. You benefit from reduced costs to upkeep and recruit Fyrd units during the Spring and Summer months.
Without stability, the land cannot prosper. Improve the happiness of your provincial Governors to gain benefits to your Fyrd units.

Bravery and fortitude are the very best qualities in man, and can both be found among the heroes of the Welsh!\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]Increase heroism through heroic victories, character followers, and missions. Rioting, uncontrolled banditry, and military defeats will reduce heroism. Heroism may be spent on Bard Songs. [[/col]]
There are now more heroes in this land than blood being spilled in its defence!
